function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on permits and services for park funding","Impact":"Financial instability and potential closure of the park","Mitigation":"Diversify funding sources and establish long-term funding strategies","Technologies":"Financial management software for budgeting and forecasting","People":"Park management, businesses within the park, and local community","Owner":"Park management and local businesses"},{"Description":"Lack of biodiversity protection in urban green spaces","Impact":"Loss of biodiversity, environmental degradation, and reduced recreational value","Mitigation":"Implement biodiversity protection measures, sustainable land use planning, and ecological restoration","Technologies":"GIS mapping for land use planning, ecological monitoring sensors","People":"Employees and visitors of public enterprises, local community","Owner":"Public enterprises and environmental management agencies"},{"Description":"Coordination challenges in polycentric park management","Impact":"Inefficient management, lack of coordination, and conflicting interests","Mitigation":"Establish communication protocols, define clear management roles, and facilitate inter-agency collaboration","Technologies":"Project management software, communication tools, scheduling software","People":"Agencies from different levels of government, park management, municipal authorities","Owner":"Government agencies and park management"}]}
